application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Works to Lombardy Poplar tree covered by LBE ORDER NO 256 (1999) - T1 - Fell.
site_name: Woodland To Rear/side Of15 The GlenEnfieldEN2 7BZ
decision_conditions: This consent is valid for two years.Reason: In order that the nature of work pertaining to this consent remains appropriate.

Tree work should not be carried out during periods that are likely to interfere with or disturb breeding birds or mammals.Reason: In order to comply with the requirements of the Wildlife and Countryside Act (1981) and Conservation of Habitats and Species Regulations (2010).

This Notice in no way overrides the right of the owner of the land upon which the subject tree is located to refuse to allow the works hereby approved or deny access to their property or airspace above it to facilitate the works. The relevant consents must first be obtained by the landowner prior to the commencement of any works.Reason: To ensure the appropriate permissions are obtained where work to trees not within the applicant's ownership has been agreed in principle.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet)
